entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: The school where the students are attending is referred to as Hogwarts.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is a teacher at Hogwarts, mentioned conducting the Weasley twins' song and clapping for them afterwards.

entities.name: weasley twins
entities.description: The Weasley twins are students at Hogwarts who are singing along to a funeral march when Dumbledore joins in.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: Percy is a student and the leader of the Gryffindor first-years, guiding them out of the Great Hall.

relationships.description: Dumbledore conducted the Weasley twins' song with his wand.
Percy led the Gryffindor first-years out of the Great Hall, but Dumbledore is not directly leading them; however, he is mentioned as one of those who clapped for the Weasley twins' performance.
Dumbledore is a teacher at Hogwarts.
